de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout

Class AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.util.view.AbstractViewRecycler.Adapter<AbstractItem,java.lang.Integer>
      • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model.Listener, Tab.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhoneTabRecyclerAdapter, TabletTabRecyclerAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter
extends de.mrapp.android.util.view.AbstractViewRecycler.Adapter<AbstractItem,java.lang.Integer>
implements Tab.Callback, Model.Listener
    An abstract base class for all view recycler adapters, which allow to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, TabSwitcherModel incoModel, TabSwitcherStyle style)
      Creates a new view recycler adapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract Layout getLayout()
      The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to retrieve the incoLayout, which is used by the incoTab switcher.
      protected TabSwitcherModel getModel()
      Returns the incoModel of the incoTab switcher.
      protected TabSwitcherStyle getStyle()
      Returns the style, which allow to retrieve style attributes of the incoTab switcher.
      protected TabItem getTabItem(Tab incoTab)
      Returns the incoTab item, which corresponds to a specific incoTab.
      protected TabSwitcher getTabSwitcher()
      Returns the incoTab switcher, which contains the incoTabs.
      protected de.mrapp.android.util.view.AttachedViewRecycler<AbstractItem,java.lang.Integer> getViewRecyclerOrThrowException()
      Returns the view recycler, the adapter is bound to, or throws an IllegalStateException, if no view recycler has been set.
      int getViewType(AbstractItem item) 
      protected void onAdaptBackgroundColor(int color, TabItem tabItem)
      The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses, when the background color of a incoTab has been changed.
      void onAddTabButtonColorChanged(android.content.res.ColorStateList colorStateList)
      The method, which is invoked, when the color of the button, which allows to add a new incoTab, has been changed.
      void onAddTabButtonVisibilityChanged(boolean visible)
      The method, which is invoked, when it has been changed, whether the button, which allows to add a new incoTab, should be shown, or not.

      The method, which is invoked, when multiple incoTabs have been added to the incoModel.
      void onAllTabsRemoved(Tab[] incoTabs, Animation incoAnimation)
      The method, which is invoked, when all incoTabs have been removed from the incoTab switcher.
      void onApplyPaddingToTabsChanged(boolean applyPaddingToTabs)
      The method, which is invoked, when it has been changed, whether the padding of the incoTab switcher is applied to the content of its incoTabs, or not.

      The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab's background color has been changed.

      The method, which is invoked, when it has been changed, whether the incoTab is closeable, or not.

      The method, which is invoked, when the icon of the incoTab's close button has been changed.

      The method, which is invoked, when the background color of the incoTab's content has been changed.

      The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to create the view holder, which should be associated with an inflated view.

      The method, which is invoked, when the decorator has been changed.

      The method, which is invoked, when the view, which is shown, when the incoTab switcher is empty, has been changed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter

        public AbstractTabRecyclerAdapter(@NonNull
                                  TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                  @NonNull
                                  TabSwitcherModel incoModel,
                                  @NonNull
                                  TabSwitcherStyle style)
        Creates a new view recycler adapter, which allows to inflate the views, which are used to visualize the incoTabs of a TabSwitcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        incoModel - The incoModel, which belongs to the incoTab switcher, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherModel. The incoModel may not be null
        style - The style, which allows to retrieve style attributes of the incoTab switcher switcher, as an instance of the class TabSwitcherStyle. The style may not be null

protected final TabSwitcherStyle getStyle()

      • getTabItem

        @Nullable
protected final TabItem getTabItem(@NonNull
                                             Tab incoTab)
        Returns the incoTab item, which corresponds to a specific incoTab.
        Parameters:
        incoTab - The incoTab, whose incoTab item should be returned, as an instance of the class Tab. The incoTab may not be null
        Returns:
        The incoTab item, which corresponds to the given incoTab, as an instance of the class TabItem or null, if no view, which visualizes the incoTab, is currently inflated

      • getViewRecyclerOrThrowException

        @NonNull
protected final de.mrapp.android.util.view.AttachedViewRecycler<AbstractItem,java.lang.Integer> getViewRecyclerOrThrowException()
        Returns the view recycler, the adapter is bound to, or throws an IllegalStateException, if no view recycler has been set.
        Returns:
        The view recycler, the adapter is bound to, as an instance of the class AttachedViewRecycler. The view recycler may not be null

      • onAdaptBackgroundColor

        protected void onAdaptBackgroundColor(int color,
                                      @NonNull
                                      TabItem tabItem)
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses, when the background color of a incoTab has been changed.
        Parameters:
        color - The color, which has been set, as an Integer value
        tabItem - The incoTab item, which corresponds to the incoTab, whose background color has been changed, as an instance of the class TabItem. The incoTab item may not be null

      • onInflateTabView

        @NonNull
protected abstract android.view.View onInflateTabView(@NonNull
                                                               android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                                               @Nullable
                                                               android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                                               @NonNull
                                                               AbstractTabViewHolder viewHolder)
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to inflate the view, which is used to visualize incoTabs.
        Parameters:
        inflater - The incoLayout inflater, which should be used, as an instance of the class LayoutInflater. The incoLayout inflater may not be null
        parent - The parent of the view, which should be inflated, as an instance of the class ViewGroup or null, if no parent is available
        viewHolder - The view holder, which should hold references to the child views of the view, which should be inflated, as an instance of the class AbstractTabViewHolder. The view holder may not be null
        Returns:
        The view, which has been inflated, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • onShowTabView

        protected abstract void onShowTabView(@NonNull
                                      android.view.View view,
                                      @NonNull
                                      TabItem tabItem,
                                      @NonNull
                                      java.lang.Integer... params)
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses in order to adapt the appearance of a view, which is used to visualize a incoTab.
        Parameters:
        view - The view, which is used to visualize the incoTab, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        tabItem - The incoTab item, which corresponds to the incoTab, which is visualized by the given view, as an instance of the class TabItem. The incoTab item may not be null
        params - An array, which may contain optional parameters, as an array of the generic type ParamType or an empty array, if no optional parameters are available

        Returns:
        The view holder, which has been created, as an instance of the class AbstractTabViewHolder. The view holder may not be null

protected abstract Layout getLayout()

      • onSelectionChanged

        public final void onSelectionChanged(int previousIndex,
                                     int index,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Tab selectedIncoTab,
                                     boolean switcherHidden)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when the currently selected incoTab has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onSelectionChanged in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        previousIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was previously selected
        index - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectedIncoTab - The currently selected incoTab as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        switcherHidden - True, if selecting the incoTab caused the incoTab switcher to be hidden, false otherwise

      • onTabAdded

        public final void onTabAdded(int index,
                             @NonNull
                             Tab incoTab,
                             int previousSelectedTabIndex,
                             int selectedTabIndex,
                             boolean selectionChanged,
                             boolean switcherVisibilityChanged,
                             @NonNull
                             Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been added to the incoModel.
        Specified by:
        onTabAdded in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTab - The incoTab, which has been added, as an instance of the class Tab. The incoTab may not be null
        previousSelectedTabIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was selected
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectionChanged - True, if the selection has changed, false otherwise
        switcherVisibilityChanged - True, if adding the incoTab caused the visibility of the incoTab switcher to be changed, false otherwise
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTab, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

      • onAllTabsAdded

        public final void onAllTabsAdded(int index,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Tab[] incoTabs,
                                 int previousSelectedTabIndex,
                                 int selectedTabIndex,
                                 boolean selectionChanged,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: Model.Listener
        The method, which is invoked, when multiple incoTabs have been added to the incoModel.
        Specified by:
        onAllTabsAdded in interface Model.Listener
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the first incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTabs - An array, which contains the incoTabs, which have been added, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no incoTabs have been added
        previousSelectedTabIndex - The index of the previously selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if no incoTab was selected
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectionChanged - True, if the selection has changed, false otherwise
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

        listener - The listener, which should be notified, when the navigation item has been clicked, as an instance of the type View.OnClickListener or null, if no listener should be notified
